subSubSection.paragraph:
The genus
Allodiatrype
was introduced by Konta et al. (2020) , which was characterised by regular or irregular-shaped stromata, erumpent through host surface, asci with 8 spores and aseptate, allantoid ascospores. In this study, we introduce a new record of
Allodiatrype thailandica
(R.H. Perera et al.) Konta & K.D. Hyde collected from Yunnan Province in China.
